node.title: Jack White marries musician Olivia Jean at Detroit show
node.description: White asked her to marry him during a rendition of the song "Hotel Yorba" and right before the lyric "let's get married."
node.content: ["Jack White surprised fans by marrying musician Olivia Jean on stage during his Detroit homecoming show Friday.", "The Detroit-born singer, songwriter and producer invited Jean onstage to join his performance and introduced her as his girlfriend.", "White asked her to marry him during a rendition of the song \"Hotel Yorba\" right before the lyric \"let's get married.\"", "Jean, a fellow Detroit native, teared up and said yes, the Detroit Free Press\u00a0reported. White then carried her offstage.", "The two later re-emerged for an encore and were married in an onstage ceremony officiated by Ben Swank, a co-founder of White's record label.", "Jean is part of the label's garage goth rock band Black Belles, which is on hiatus, and is also signed by his label as a solo artist.", "White, who founded the White Stripes, was previously married twice. His Friday show was his first hometown solo show since 2018, and kicked off his Supply Chain Issues Tour and release of his new album \"Fear of the Dawn.\""]
